operator
Class TreeDynamicEqualizer

java.lang.Object
  operator.Operator
      operator.TreeDynamicEqualizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Equalizer
Direct Known Subclasses:
DummyTreeEqualizer
public class TreeDynamicEqualizer
extends Operator
implements Equalizer

This operator is an implementation of Silva's Dynamic Operator Equalization, as described in her paper ( Silva and Dignum. Extending Operator Equalisation: Fitness Based Self Adaptive Length Distribution for Bloat Free GP. EuroGP 2009). The idea is we bin all individuals based on their size, and use the binning to intelligently accept or reject individuals.

Author:
Owen Derby

update

public void update(Population init)
            throws GPException
Description copied from interface: Equalizer
Initialize the equalizer for a new generation of init. Reset the equalizer for a new generation, starting out with an initial population given by init.
